title: FS: McGraw portrait GAI 2.5, Marquard portrait PSA4, LaFitte (SL) PSA4 (MK)
author: bcornell

posts.post_title: FS: McGraw portrait GAI 2.5, Marquard portrait PSA4, LaFitte (SL) PSA4 (MK)
posts.post_content:
I have 3 T206's for sale.  Any form of payment is okay; add $2 for shipping or more if you want insurance.  Please, no best offers or trades for these.  You can respond here, PM me, or send an email to [url]bill@t207.com[/url].  Thanks.

McGraw portrait GAI 2.5.  Card has a lower right corner crease.  sold

Marquard portrait PSA4.  Scuff on bottom right, back is a bit dirty.  This should have been a PSA 3, I think.  $115

LaFitte (SL) PSA 4 (MK).  Solid VG-EX.  Owner's stamp of "George Granger" on the back.  $145

[IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/sale/t206_mcgraw_gai2.5.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/sale/t206_mcgraw_gai2.5_back.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/sale/t206_marquard_psa4.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/sale/t206_marquard_psa4_back.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/sale/t206_lafitte_psa4.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.t207.com/images/sale/t206_lafitte_psa4_back.jpg[/IMG]
The McGraw is sold, but the other 2 cards are still available.
